author: mrwinnie
post_text: October 11, 2018 at 12:50 PM#1I have a Full pool of Songs that the band does. Is there a way to fire a macro that will Auto copy Sequences into a Master Sequence for the show that day?Something like ( Copy @ ) then select all the Songs and it works its magic to make a new sequence with all the selected songs.

title: Auto Build Sequences
